description: Use Polaris as Iceberg Rest Catalog.
on_init: create secret polaris_secret (TYPE ICEBERG,CLIENT_ID '${POLARIS_CLIENT_ID}',CLIENT_SECRET '${POLARIS_CLIENT_SECRET}',ENDPOINT 'http://0.0.0.0:8181/api/catalog'); attach 'quickstart_catalog' as my_datalake (type ICEBERG,ENDPOINT 'http://0.0.0.0:8181/api/catalog');
